data.question: What ligand was used in the construction of the metal-organic framework (MOF) mentioned?
What unique feature does the MOF JLU-Liu1 exhibit in terms of gas adsorption?
data.answer: It exhibits highly selective CO2 uptake over N2 and CH4.

data.question: What is the coordination state of Cu1 in the structure of JLU-Liu1?
What is the total CO2 uptake of the activated JLU-Liu1 at 298 K?
What method was used to synthesize JLU-Liu1?
What is the space group of JLU-Liu1?
Why does JLU-Liu1 exhibit selective adsorption of CO2 over N2 and CH4?
data.answer: Due to the difference in the kinetic diameters of the gases and the size of the channels in the framework.

data.question: What is the effect of the small pore size on the heat of adsorption in JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: It increases the heat of adsorption.

data.question: How was the phase purity of the guest-exchanged samples of JLU-Liu1 evaluated?
What is the role of the uncoordinated oxygen atoms of the sulfate ion in JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: They are arrayed along the inner wall of the channels, affecting gas adsorption.

data.question: What is the significance of the helical chains in the framework of JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: They contribute to the structural integrity and possibly influence gas adsorption properties.

data.question: How does the solvothermal reaction temperature affect the formation of JLU-Liu1?
data.answer: The reaction temperature of 115 1C is critical for the formation of green block-shaped crystals of JLU-Liu1.

Are all copper atoms in JLU-Liu1 five-connected?
Is the heat of sorption (Qst) of JLU-Liu1 for CO2 lower than most MOFs?
